items.question: Is StockFlow really 100% free for SMEs in Flanders?
items.answer: Yes, StockFlow is completely free for SMEs. No hidden costs, no limits on users or products. We believe every business should have access to professional inventory management.

items.question: How does the free inventory management program work?
items.answer: Register your free account, add your products, and start managing your inventory immediately. Our inventory management system is intuitive and requires no technical knowledge.

items.question: Can I use StockFlow on my mobile phone?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our inventory management app works perfectly on all devices - smartphone, tablet and desktop. Always and everywhere access to your inventory data.

items.question: Is my data safe in the cloud?
items.answer: Yes, we take the security of your data very seriously. Daily backups, SSL encryption and GDPR compliance ensure that your inventory data is always safe.

items.question: How does StockFlow differ from other inventory management software?
items.answer: StockFlow is specifically developed for SMEs, completely free, and offers all essential functions without complexity. No expensive licenses or hidden costs like with Odoo or Exact.
